name: NPR
text:
French police are protesting after the country’s ban on chokeholds, saying they are being stigmatized in the wake of George Floyd’s death. 

"The police in France have nothing to do with the police in the U.S.," said the head of the main police union.
https://t.co/9RHSOQJCOh

name: NPR
text:
No, the U.S. has not entered a second wave of coronavirus infections.

Here's why we're stuck in a plateau — and what forecasters say might come next.
https://t.co/ccEldZq6Ck
